Rattrap:



Rattrap walked down and finally found the owner of the voice. He 
watched as she fired randomly. It seemed to him that someone was 
after her. 

She ran off, a few yards away from him. He kept his body low and 
scampered after her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She stopped and transformed into bot mode.  She screamed at the top 
> of her lungs, "LEAVE ME ALONE! GO AWAY!"
> She drew her gun and fired randomly around her.
> Her logic ciruits were getting fried.  A small ribbon of smoke 
crept 
> out of her head plating.  She ran up the hill and started running 
> along the side of the hill.
